mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PROJECTTABLE P JOIN PROJECTMEMBER PM USING(PROJECTNO) WHERE PM.USERID=#{id}
SELECT * FROM TASK JOIN PROJECTBOARD USING(BOARDNO) WHERE PROJECTNO=#{no}

SELECT TASKNO,TASKTITLE,TASKSTATE,TASKPROIORITY,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TASKSTARTDATE), 'yyyy/mm/dd') AS TASKSTARTDATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TASKENDDATE), 'yyyy/mm/dd') AS TASKENDDATE,TASKCONTENT,TASKID,BOARDNO,USERNAME,PROFILE FROM TASK JOIN STOOLUSER ON TASKID=USERID WHERE BOARDNO=#{boardNo}
SELECT S.USERNAME,T.BOARDNO FROM STOOLUSER S JOIN TASKMANAGER TM ON S.USERID=TM.TASKMANAGERID JOIN TASK T ON T.TASKNO=TM.TASKNO WHERE T.BOARDNO=#{boardNo}
